pkgmetadata.longdescription: Partial Orders in Socio-Economics // Implements tools for the analysis of partially ordered data, with a particular focus on the evaluation of multidimensional systems of indicators and on the analysis of poverty. References, Fattore M. (2016) doi:10.1007/s11205-015-1059-6 Fattore M., Arcagni A. (2016) doi:10.1007/s11205-016-1501-4 Arcagni A. (2017) doi:10.1007/978-3-319-45421-4_19.
